Lannister.name: Sandor Clegane, The Hound
Lannister.abilities:
Affiliation: House Clegane /
Fueled By Slaughter /
Furious Charge
Lannister.quote: "Killing is the sweetest thing there is."

Lannister.name: Tywin Lannister, Lord of Casterly Rock
Lannister.quote: "There is a tool for every task, and a task for every tool."

Lannister.name: Tyrion Lannister, Halfman
Lannister.quote: "Those are brave men. Let's go kill them."

Lannister.name: Barristan Selmy, Lord Commander of The Kingsguard
Lannister.quote: "Of these seven, only Ser Barristan Selmy is made of the true steel, and Selmy is old." -Varys

Lannister.name: Jaime Lannister, Kingsguard
Lannister.quote: "...A Sworn Brother of the White Swords, and we all know what his oath is worth." -Varys

Lannister.name: Mandon Moore, Kingsguard
Lannister.quote: "Death in snow-white silk." -Tyrion Lannister

Lannister.name: Meryn Trant, Kingsguard
Lannister.quote: "Once they were a marvel, a shining lesson to the world..." -Bran Stark

Lannister.name: Arys Oakheart, Kingsguard
Lannister.quote: "There have always been men who found it easier to speak vows than to keep them."

Lannister.name: Boros Blount, Kingsguard
Lannister.quote: "No man threatens His Grace in the presence of the Kingsuard!"

Lannister.name: Preston Greenfield, Kingsguard
Lannister.quote: "Who listens to everything yet hears nothing?" "A Knight of the Kingsuard."

Lannister.name: Gregor Clegane, Lord Tywin's Mad Dog
Lannister.quote: "No one could ever withstand Gregor."

Lannister.name: Jaime Lannister, The Kingslayer
Lannister.quote: "They called him the Lion of Lannister to his face and whispered "Kingslayer" behind his back."

Lannister.name: Gregor Clegane, The Mountain
Lannister.abilities:
Affiliation: House Clegane /
Furious Charge /
Unstoppable Wrath
Lannister.quote: "No other knight in the realm inspires such terror in our enemies."

Lannister.name: Jaime Lannister, The Young Lion
Lannister.quote: "There are no men like me. There's only me."

Lannister.name: Gregor Clegane, Mounted Behemoth
Lannister.quote:
"That beast's head would make a noble gift for all the people of the realm, I vow."
-Brynden Tully

Lannister.name: Tyrion Lannister, The Giant of Lannister
Lannister.quote: "I think he is a giant come among us, here at the end of the world." -Maester Aemon

Lannister.name: Joffrey Baratheon, First of His Name
Lannister.quote: "My son. How could I have made a son like that, Ned?." -Robert Baratheon

Lannister.name: The High Sparrow, His High Holiness
Lannister.quote: "What have we become, when kings and high lords must dance to the twittering of Sparrows."

Lannister.name: Qyburn, Forbidden Knowledge
Lannister.quote: "The Citadel took my chain, but they could not take my knowledge."

Lannister.name: Addam Marbrand, Trusted Bannerman
Lannister.quote: "I should welcome the chance to try my own steel against this Stark boy."

Lannister.name: Ser Robert Strong, The Silent Giant
Lannister.quote: "We do not even know if he's alive." -Kevan Lannister

Lannister.name: Addam Marbrand, Commander of the City Watch
Lannister.quote: "Like Jaime, he was the sort of man other men liked to follow." -Tyrion Lannister

Lannister.name: Kevan Lannister, Protector of the Realm
Lannister.abilities:
Order: Lannister Supremacy /
Might of the Throne
Lannister.quote: "There are many like you, good men in service to bad causes ..." -Varys

Stark.name: Robb Stark, The Wolf Lord
Stark.quote: "All men should keep their word, kings most of all."

Stark.name: Greatjon Umber, Lord of Last Hearth
Stark.abilities:
Order: Overrun /
Order: Reckless Heroism /
Affiliation: House Umber
Stark.quote: "Grey Wind ate two of his fingers, and he laughed about it."

Stark.name: Greatjon Umber, Fierce Bannerman
Stark.quote: "Your father once told me that the Greatjon was as fearless as any man he had ever known."

Stark.name: Robb Stark, The Young Wolf
Stark.quote: "No sword is strong until it’s been tempered."

Stark.name: Bran and Hodor, Protector and Ward
Stark.quote:
"Hodor. Hodor Hodor."
"You're right, it seems dangerous."

Stark.name: Brynden Tully, The Blackfish
Stark.abilities:
Affiliation: House Tully /
Stalwart /
Stand Your Ground!
Stark.quote: "My first rule of war, Cat, is never give the enemy his wish."

Stark.name: Brynden Tully, Unyielding Knight
Stark.abilities:
Affiliation: House Tully /
Dauntless /
Iron Resolve
Stark.quote: "Lift your eyes, and you will see the direwolf still flies above our walls!"

Stark.name: Eddard Stark, Lord of Winterfell
Stark.quote: "Know the men who follow you and let them know you. Don't ask your men to die for a stranger."

Stark.name: Rodrik Cassel, Master-at-Arms
Stark.abilities:
Order: Mark Target /
Boldness and Courage
Stark.quote: "When we speak of the morrow nothing is ever certain."

Stark.name: Maege Mormont, The She-Bear
Stark.quote: "Maege is a hoary old snark, stubborn, short-tempered, and willful."

Stark.name: Brynden Tully, Vanguard Infiltrator
Stark.quote: "No one knows the lands of the North quite as well as Brynden."

Stark.name: Brynden Tully, Outrider Commander
Stark.quote: "It is no good hammering your sword into a plowshare if you must forge it again on the morrow."

Stark.name: Meera Reed, Cunning Trapper
Stark.quote: "Mudmen are sneaks, they won't fight like decent folks." -Little Walder Frey

Stark.name: Jojen Reed, Greensight
Stark.quote: "To Winterfell we pledge the faith of Greywater. Hearth and heart and harvest we yield up to you."

Stark.name: Syrio Forel, First Blade of Braavos
Stark.quote: "My words lied. My eyes and my arm shouted out the truth, but you were not seeing."

Stark.name: Rickon Stark, Prince of Winterfell
Stark.quote: "Are we going where Shaggydog is?"

Stark.name: Osha, Spearwife Guardian
Stark.abilities:
Counterstrike /
Stubborn Tenacity /
Must be attached to 'Rickon Stark'
Stark.quote: "The giants I’ve seen, the children I’ve heard tell of, and the white walkers ..."

Stark.name: Howland Reed, Lord of the Crannogs
Stark.abilities:
Order: Superior Flanking /
Affiliation: Crannogman /
Disrupt
Stark.quote: "You never see them, but they see you. Those who go into the bogs after them get lost and never come out."

Stark.name: Rickard Karstark, Vengeful Bannerman
Stark.quote: "Make no mistake, Robb—these are your bannermen, not your friends." -Catelyn Stark

Stark.name: Rickard Karstark, Lord of Karhold
Stark.abilities:
Affiliation: House Karstark /
Superior Numbers /
Fueled By Slaughter
Stark.quote: "In war you kill your enemies. Didn't your father teach you that, boy?"

Stark.name: Maege Mormont, Lady of Bear Island
Stark.quote: "Like as not, my sister is marching in your brother’s host, her and those daughters of hers, dressed in men’s mail" -Jeor Mormont to Jon Snow

Free Folk.name: Tormund Giantsbane, Thunderfist
Free Folk.quote: "He seemed to me the sort of man who would make a good friend and a bad enemy."

Free Folk.name: Tormund Giantsbane, Tall-Talker, Horn-Blower, Breaker of Ice
Mance Rayder, King Beyond the Wall
Free Folk.abilities:
Order: Counterstrategy /
Inspiring Presence /
Rally Point
Free Folk.quote: "I am my own champion, my own fool, and my own harpist."

Free Folk.name: Eagle
Free Folk.abilities:
Bonded Eagle /
Aerial Scouting /
Fielded by Skinchanger

Free Folk.name: Wolf
Free Folk.abilities:
Bonded Wolf /
Predator's Instincts /
Fielded by Skinchanger

Free Folk.name: Styr, Magnar of Thenn
Free Folk.quote: "To the Thenns, the Magnar is more a living god than a man."

Free Folk.name: Rattleshirt, The Lord of Bones
Free Folk.quote: "Rattleshirt could wash his hands a hundred times a day and he'd still have blood beneath his nails."

Free Folk.name: Rattleshirt, Ruthless Slaughterer
Free Folk.quote: "A small, malicious, treacherous man, as stupid as he is cruel."

Free Folk.name: Harma, Vanguard Commander
Free Folk.quote: "I'll keep his head for my standard. A turncloak's worse than a dog."

Free Folk.name: Harma, The Dogshead
Free Folk.quote: "Every fortnight a new dog, a new banner."

Free Folk.name: Harma's Bannerman
Free Folk.quote: "She hates dogs almost as much as she hates crows."

Free Folk.name: The Weeper, Horrific Butcher
Free Folk.quote: "Cutting out the eyes, that's the Weeper's work. The best crow's a blind crow, he likes to say."

Free Folk.name: The Weeper, Cruel Tyrant
Free Folk.quote: "The Weeper will not say the words. He will not wear the cloak. Even other raiders do not trust him."

Free Folk.name: Ygritte, Spearwife Archer
Free Folk.quote: "Men can’t own the land no more’n they can own the sea or the sky."

Free Folk.name: The Great Walrus, Steeled Through Ice and Snow
Jon Snow, The Crow-Come-Over
Free Folk.quote:
"Men are men and women women, no matter which side of the Wall we were born on."
-Lady Val

Free Folk.name: Borroq, Boar Skinchanger
Free Folk.quote: "And where will you be, crow? Hiding here in Castle Black with your white dog?"

Free Folk.name: The Great Walrus, Lord of the Frozen Shore
Free Folk.abilities:
Affiliation: Frozen Shore /
Go Down Fighting /
Hardened
Free Folk.quote: "A savage folk. The men are bad, the women worse." -Tormund Giantsbane

Neutral.name: Ramsay Snow, The Bastard of Bolton
Neutral.quote: "Snow, my wife called me before she ate her fingers, but I say Bolton."

Neutral.name: Ramsay Snow, Sadist
Neutral.abilities:
Affiliation: House Bolton /
Fueled By Slaughter /
Intimidating Presence
Neutral.quote: "A naked man has few secrets, but a flayed man's got none."

Neutral.name: Theon Greyjoy, Reek
Neutral.abilities:
Order: Set An Example / 
Must be attached to 'Ramsay Snow'
Neutral.quote: "I'm not him, I'm not the turncloak, he died at Winterfell. My name is Reek!"

Neutral.name: Brienne, Maiden of Tarth
Neutral.quote: "A true knight is sworn to protect those who are weaker than himself, or die in the attempt."

Neutral.name: Bronn, The Sellsword
Neutral.abilities:
Loyalty Through Coin /
Motivated by Coin (Bronn)
Neutral.quote: "I sell my sword, I don’t give it away."

Neutral.name: Vargo Hoat, The Goat of Harrenhal
Neutral.abilities:
Order: Threaten /
Affiliation: Bloody Mummers /
Sadistic Mutilation
Neutral.quote: "The goat is Lord of Harrenhal, and the Lord of Harrenhal does not haggle."

Neutral.name: Vargo Hoat, The Crippler
Neutral.quote: "How many monsters does Lord Tywin have?"

Neutral.name: Daario Naharis, Stormcrow Captain
Neutral.abilities:
Affiliation: Stormcrows /
Improved Armaments /
Motivated by Coin (Daario Naharis)
Neutral.quote: "He has a sellsword's conscience, That is to say, none at all."

Neutral.name: Daario Naharis, Reckless Mercenary
Neutral.quote: "I count no day as lived unless I have loved a woman, slain a foeman, and eaten a fine meal."

Neutral.name: Roose Bolton, The Leech Lord
Neutral.abilities:
Order: Spread Fear /
Affiliation: House Bolton /
Intimidating Presence
Neutral.quote: "Fear is what keeps a man alive in this world of treachery and deceit."

Night's Watch.name: Jeor Mormont, 997th Lord Commander
Night's Watch.quote: "When dead men come hunting in the night, do you think it matters who sits the Iron Throne?"

Night's Watch.name: Jon Snow, 998th Lord Commander
Night's Watch.quote: "There's no shame in fear, my father told me, what matters is how we face it."

Night's Watch.name: Jon Snow, "Lord Snow"
Night's Watch.abilities:
Order: Reckless Heroism /
Order: War Cry
Night's Watch.quote: "The only gods he worshipped were honor and duty."

Night's Watch.name: Alliser Thorne, Master-at-Arms
Night's Watch.quote: "When the winter comes you will die like flies."

Night's Watch.name: Alliser Thorne, Vindictive Overseer
Night's Watch.quote: "I have seen dead men with more humor than your Ser Alliser."

Night's Watch.name: Donal Noye, Defender of Castle Black
Night's Watch.quote: "A one-armed smith slew Mag the Mighty? Har! That must o' been a fight to see."

Night's Watch.name: Grenn, Aurochs
Night's Watch.quote: "Grenn's the ugly one." -Pypar

Night's Watch.name: Pypar, Monkey
Night's Watch.quote: "You're uglier than me. At least I don't have ears like a bat." -Grenn

Night's Watch.name: Qhorin Halfhand, Grizzled Ranger
Night's Watch.abilities:
Battle Scars (Qhorin Halfhand)/
Go Down Fighting
Night's Watch.quote: "Why else do we don these black cloaks, but to die in defense of the realm?"

Night's Watch.name: Othell Yarwyck, Spotter
Night's Watch.quote: "Pick who you want. Just so it's not me."

Night's Watch.name: Watch Marshal
Night's Watch.abilities:
Order: Adaptive Planning /
Order: Swift Retreat

Night's Watch.name: Othell Yarwyck, First Builder
Night's Watch.quote: "Few men possess the knowledge or skills of the First Builder."

Night's Watch.name: Benjen Stark, Wolf of the Wall
Night's Watch.quote: "The Night's Watch is a sworn brotherhood. We have no families."

Night's Watch.name: Coldhands, Enigmatic Guide
Night's Watch.quote: "They killed him long ago."

Night's Watch.name: Samwell Tarley, Sam The Slayer
Night's Watch.quote: "I went beyond the Wall and fought in battles. They call me Sam the Slayer."

Night's Watch.name: Coldhands, Former Crow
Night's Watch.quote: "Dead meat, dry blood, a faint whiff of rot. And cold. Cold over all."

Night's Watch.name: Benjen Stark, First Ranger
Night's Watch.quote: "There's not a man on the Wall knows the haunted forest better than Benjen Stark."

Night's Watch.name: Cotter Pyke, Ironborn Brother
Night's Watch.quote: "... if you muck this up, I'm going to rip your liver out and eat it raw with onions."

Night's Watch.name: Yoren, Harsh Recruiter
Night's Watch.quote: "I got thirty this time, men and boys all bound for the Wall..."

Night's Watch.name: Satin, Commander's Steward
Night's Watch.quote: "Whatever Satin may have done in Oldtown, he is our brother now..." -Jon Snow

Night's Watch.name: Satin, Brave Recruit
Night's Watch.quote: "Half a year at Castle Black had toughened up his hands... Whether he had the courage to face what was coming, though..."

Night's Watch.name: Eddison Tollett, Dolorous Edd
Night's Watch.quote: "Once they figure a way to work a dead horse, we'll be next. Likely I'll be the first too."

Night's Watch.name: Benjen Stark, Beyond The Wall
Night's Watch.abilities:
Ranging Specialist (Benjen) /
Order: Hidden Traps /
Disrupt
Night's Watch.quote: "I've not seen Benjen Stark for three years. And if truth be told, I never once missed him." -Craster

Night's Watch.name: Cotter Pyke, Eastwatch Commander
Night's Watch.abilities:
Order: Reckless Heroism /
Fueled By Slaughter
Night's Watch.quote: "Cotter Pyke always had more guts than sense." -Mance Rayder

Night's Watch.name: Ser Denys Mallister, Shadow Tower Commander
Night's Watch.quote: "Do not make me die regretful."

Targaryen.name: Jorah Mormont, Westerosi Tactician
Targaryen.quote: "I vow to serve you, to obey you, to die for you if need be. Whatever may come."

Targaryen.name: Jorah Mormont, The Exiled Knight
Targaryen.quote: "I did things it shames me to speak of... In the end it cost me all."

Targaryen.name: Barristan Selmy, The Bold
Targaryen.quote: " I am a knight. I shall die a knight."

Targaryen.name: Belwas, Veteran Pit-Fighter
Targaryen.quote: " Bad fighting, good dying. Strong Belwas hates it when they scream."

Targaryen.name: Jorah Mormont, Penitent Betrayer
Targaryen.abilities:
Whatever May Come /
Must be attached to 'Daenerys Targaryen'
Targaryen.quote: "He lied to me, informed on me, but he loved me too, and he always gave good counsel."

Targaryen.name: Jorah Mormont, The Andal
Targaryen.abilities:
Order: Martial Training /
Stand Your Ground!
Targaryen.quote: "There is a savage beast in every man, and when you hand that man a sword or spear and send him forth to war, the beast stirs."

Targaryen.name: Belwas, The Strong
Targaryen.quote: "I let each man cut me once, before I kill him. Count the cuts and you will know how many Strong Belwas has slain."

Targaryen.name: Grey Worm, Unsullied Commander
Targaryen.quote: "I don't make peace with the queen's enemies. I kill the queen's enemies."

Targaryen.name: Grey Worm, Freed by the Dragon
Targaryen.quote: "Grey Worm is the name this one drew the day Daenerys Stormborn set him free."

Targaryen.name: Daenerys Targaryen, Mother of Dragons
Targaryen.abilities:
Heir Of House Targaryen / 
Mother Of Dragons
Targaryen.quote: "I am the blood of the dragon. If they are monsters, so am I."

Targaryen.name: Daenerys Targaryen, Queen of Meereen
Targaryen.quote: "Why do the gods make kings and queens, if not to protect the ones who can't protect themselves?"

Targaryen.name: Daario Naharis, Reckless Mercenary
Targaryen.quote: "I count no day as lived unless I have loved a woman, slain a foeman, and eaten a fine meal."

Targaryen.name: Daario Naharis, Stormcrow Captain
Targaryen.abilities:
Affiliation: Stormcrows /
Improved Armaments /
Motivated by Coin (Daario Naharis)
Targaryen.quote: "He has a sellsword's conscience, That is to say, none at all."

Targaryen.name: Rakharo, Bloodrider
Targaryen.quote: "As you say, I do, blood of my blood."

Targaryen.name: Qotho, Bloodrider
Targaryen.abilities:
Bloodrider/
Intimidating Presence/
Prey On Fear
Targaryen.quote:
"The Dothraki say a man and
his bloodriders share one life..."

Targaryen.name: Cohollo, Bloodrider
Targaryen.quote:
"They were the khal's brothers,
his shadows, his fiercest friends."

Targaryen.name: Haggo, Bloodrider
Targaryen.quote:
"'Blood of my blood', Drogo called them,
and so it was; they shared a single life."

Greyjoy.name: Asha Greyjoy, The Kraken's Daughter
Greyjoy.abilities:
Inspiring Presence / 
Rally Point / 
Stubborn Tenacity
Greyjoy.quote: "I am the heir of Balon's body."

Greyjoy.name: Asha Greyjoy, Captain of the Black Wind
Greyjoy.quote: "No fight is hopeless till it has been fought.."

Greyjoy.name: Victarion Greyjoy, The Iron Captain
Greyjoy.quote: "I could sail the Iron Fleet to hell if need be."

Greyjoy.name: Victarion Greyjoy, Master of the Iron Victory
Greyjoy.quote: "Wizards may be well and good, but blood and steel win wars."

Greyjoy.name: Theon Greyjoy, Kinslayer
Greyjoy.quote: "The cloak my father swaddled me in bore a kraken, not a direwolf."

Greyjoy.name: Theon Greyjoy, "Prince" of Winterfell
Greyjoy.quote: "Your lord father did what he could to gentle Theon, but I fear it was too little and too late..."

Greyjoy.name: Qarl, Asha's Champion
Greyjoy.quote: “If you liked the Shadow so well, go back there,” -Qarl to Euron Greyjoy

Greyjoy.name: Qarl, The Maid
Greyjoy.quote: "... to distinguish him from Qarl Shepherd, Qarl Quickaxe, and Qarl the Thrall, but more for his smooth cheeks."

Greyjoy.name: Nute, The Barber
Greyjoy.abilities:
Furious Charge / 
Victarion's Vassal/ 
Motivated by Coin (Nute)
Greyjoy.quote: "Glory is good, but gold is better."

Greyjoy.name: Euron Greyjoy, Lord Reaper of Pyke
Greyjoy.quote: "Balon was mad, Aeron is madder, and Euron is the maddest of them all."

Greyjoy.name: Balon Greyjoy, The Kraken King
Greyjoy.quote: "I pay the iron price. I will take my crown, as Urron Redhand did five thousand years ago."

Greyjoy.name: Euron Greyjoy, Crow's Eye
Greyjoy.quote: "I am the storm, my lord. The first storm, and the last."

Greyjoy.name: Erik Ironmaker, Anvil-Breaker
Greyjoy.abilities:
Order: Just Shares / 
Gifts of Silver and Bronze
Greyjoy.quote: "King Erik, aye, I like the sound o' that. Come, say it with me. ERIK! ERIK ANVIL-BREAKER! ERIK KING!"

Greyjoy.name: Asha Greyjoy, "Lady Greyjoy"
Greyjoy.quote: "I am Asha of House Greyjoy, aye. Opinions differ on whether I'm a lady."

Greyjoy.name: Dagmer Cleftjaw, Captain of the Foamdrinker
Greyjoy.quote: "His hair is white and his teeth are rotten, but he still has a taste for glory."

Greyjoy.name: Baelor Blacktyde, Captain of the Nightflyer
Greyjoy.quote: "Balon the Widowmaker, I call him. I will gladly trade his freedom for a father. Have you one to give?"

Greyjoy.name: Moqorro, Slave of R'hllor
Greyjoy.quote: "The Lord of Light has shown me your worth, lord Captain. Every night in my fires I glimpse the glory that awaits you."

Greyjoy.name: Baelor Blacktyde, Lord of Blacktyde
Greyjoy.quote: "Lord Blacktyde says this kingsmoot is a dangerous folly... " -Rodrik Harlaw

Greyjoy.name: Dagmer Cleftjaw, Master-at-Arms
Greyjoy.quote: "The living should smile, for the dead cannot."

Martell.name: Oberyn Martell, Prince of Dorne
Martell.quote: "The man's infamous, and not just for poisoning his sword." -Jaime Lannister

Martell.name: Areo Hotah, Captain of The Guard
Martell.abilities:
Coordinated Assault /
Furious Charge /
Duty to The Crown
Martell.quote: "It is for my prince to command,  for Hotah to obey."

Martell.name: Areo Hotah, Dutiful Juggernaut
Martell.abilities:
Order: Battle Plan / 
Order: Mark Target
Martell.quote: "Serve. Obey. Protect. Simple vows for a simple man."

Martell.name: Obara Sand, Eldest Sister
Martell.abilities:
Order: Reckless Heroism /
Fueled By Slaughter /
Sundering

Martell.name: Obara Sand, Sand Snake
Martell.quote: "She is chasing after something  she can never catch" -Areo Hotah

Martell.name: Nymeria Sand, Sand Snake
Martell.quote: "It ends in blood, as it began."

Martell.name: Elia Sand, Sand Snake
Martell.quote: "And ladies do not joust." "I do. I'm Lady Lance." -Garibald to Elia Sand.

Martell.name: Harmen Uller, Dornish Envoy
Martell.quote:
"Dorne is sand and scorpions, and bleak red mountains baking in the sun." 
-Reznak mo Reznak

Martell.name: Harmen Uller, Lord of Hellholt
Martell.quote: "I will crown Myrcella at the Hellholt and raise my banners there." -Arianne Martell
